alert.note: Alert for Cayuga; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 8:08PM EDT until June 26 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CAYUGA AND TOMPKINS COUNTIES... At 808 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Freeville, or near Ithaca, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ithaca, Cayuga Heights, Lansing, Groton, Dryden, Freeville, Brooktondale, Slaterville Springs, Besemer and Allan H. Treman State Marine Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
